subject: Order #SSN3354
description_text:
Hello

Ive recently ordered 2 of the Plus X P3-H3 pedals but only recieved 1 of
the 2 pedal sets. I would just like to know any updates or info that can
help me understand why ive only recieved 1 of the 2 sets.

Kind Regards,

Alexander Last
070-9219413

conversations.body_text: Hi Alexander Last,    We apologize that our warehouse staff did not notice the order was for two sets. We will immediately arrange for a replacement set to be sent to you.
